description: NEW YORK (AP) — US stocks surge 7%, building on a global rally, on early signs that rate of increase in virus deaths could be slowing.
title: US stocks surge 7%, building on a global rally, on early signs that rate of increase in virus deaths could be slowing
title_page: US stocks surge 7%, building on a global rally, on early signs that rate of increase in virus deaths could be slowing
maintext:
US stocks surge 7%, building on a global rally, on early signs that rate of increase in virus deaths could be slowing
NEW YORK (AP) — US stocks surge 7%, building on a global rally, on early signs that rate of increase in virus deaths could be slowing.
